a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Average learning outcomes vs. GDP per capita, 2020
Average learning outcomes correspond to harmonized scores across standardized, psychometrically-robust
international and regional student achievement tests.
Data source: Patrinos and Angrist (2018) and UNESCO via World Bank; Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
Note: GDP per capita data is expressed in international-$ at 2017 prices.
